org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass

Class TicketRegistryDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.AbstractTicketRegistry
      • org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.TicketRegistryDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TicketRegistry, TicketRegistryState
    Deprecated. 
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class TicketRegistryDecorator
extends AbstractTicketRegistry
    Decorator that captures tickets and attempts to map them.
    Since:
    1.0.7

        public void addTicket(Ticket ticket)

        Description copied from interface: TicketRegistry
        Add a ticket to the registry. Ticket storage is based on the ticket id.
        Parameters:
        ticket - The ticket we wish to add to the cache.

      • deleteTicket

        public boolean deleteTicket(java.lang.String ticketId)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: TicketRegistry
        Remove a specific ticket from the registry. If ticket to delete is TGT then related service tickets are removed as well.
        Parameters:
        ticketId - The id of the ticket to delete.
        Returns:
        true if the ticket was removed and false if the ticket did not exist.

      • getTickets

        public java.util.Collection<Ticket> getTickets()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: TicketRegistry
        Retrieve all tickets from the registry.
        Returns:
        collection of tickets currently stored in the registry. Tickets might or might not be valid i.e. expired.

        Returns:
